item.title: Anne Murray - I Just Fall In Love Again
item.description:
Dreaming
I must be dreaming
Or am I really
lying here with you
Baby you take me
in your arms
And though
I’m wide awake
I know my dream
is coming true
And oh I just
fall in love again
Just one touch
and then it happens
Every time
there I go by
Just fall in
love again
And when I do
I can’t help myself
I fall in love
with you-

Magic
it must be magic
The way I hold you
when the night
Just seems to fly
easy for you
To take me to a star
heaven is that moment
When I look into
your eyes
And oh I just
fall in love again
Just one touch
and then it happens
Every time
there I go by
Just fall in
love again
And when I do
I can’t help myself
I fall in love
with you
I can’t help
myself
I fall in love
with you-
